asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/shark-professional-steam-pocket-mop/130003. 
The Shark Professional Steam Pocket Mop featuring Intelligent Steam Contol™ offers superior cleaning and sanitation for all your hard floor surfaces. Simply adjust the steam mode to suit your floor surface and cleaning task at hand. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.
